summary: Diff adds a React Valentine page with a success state showing “Good choice” and referencing the meme image path, plus romantic-themed global CSS. However, it also introduces backend and Internet Identity/auth/react-query plumbing that was explicitly out of scope, and the required static meme asset file itself is not evidenced as added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated meme image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it in the “Yes” success state.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the image path, but the diff does not show the actual image file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister file added despite “Backend is not required” / “do not introduce unnecessary backend state or APIs.”
hallucinated_features.reason: A new backend entrypoint is introduced even though the feature is frontend-only.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider added (explicit non-goal: no authentication/user accounts).
hallucinated_features.reason: New Internet Identity hook/provider and identity-based logic were introduced, contradicting the non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Actor creation hook tied to authentication and backend interface introduced (unnecessary backend/API integration for this feature).
hallucinated_features.reason: Adds backend actor/react-query infrastructure even though no backend endpoints/state are needed for the Valentine page interaction.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query provider/client added globally (not requested for this single-page interaction).
hallucinated_features.reason: Introduces extra client-side data-fetching infrastructure not required by any stated requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer promoting an external site/link (caffeine.ai) added to the success screen.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the requested Valentine prompt interaction and introduces an extra external link/element beyond the core flow.
